definition: A large transportation hub located in the center of a city, serving as the main railway station where trains from various destinations arrive and depart. It is typically used by travelers for intercity and international train connections.

examples.english: The main train station is very big.
I will meet you at the main train station.
The main train station has many shops.

examples.german: Der Hauptbahnhof ist ein wichtiger Verkehrsknotenpunkt.
examples.english: The main train station is an important transportation hub.

examples.german: Vom Hauptbahnhof fahren viele Züge ab.
examples.english: Many trains depart from the main train station.
